column2: [From.GetFullName], a witcher in your employment has expressed his desire to leave your court.
[From.GetSheHeCap] will surely not refuse a request of a friend.
Some coin will surely change [From.GetHerHis] mind.
Since these lands are peaceful [From.GetSheHe] could stay a bit longer and rest.
And I just wanted to honor  [From.GetHerHis]  service.
A lover surely would be a good reason to stay longer.
I have no need for witcher.

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

I wish to inform you that [From.GetName] is plagued by monsters no more.

Witcher [FromFrom.GetFullName]

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

I wish to inform you that [From.GetName] is plagued by monsters no more. Although the monsters were  more than I expected and I got injured.

Witcher [FromFrom.GetFullName]

[FromFrom.GetFullName] went to [From.GetName] to clean it from monsters infesting it. There haven't been any news from [FromFrom.GetHerHim] and the monsters are still runing rampant. Sadly it can onlymean that [FromFrom.GetSheHe] died.
